title: Hello World
text: 配置环境必要软件包Node: v6.3.0Git: v2.6.3Npm: Node Package Manager v3.10.3 安装Hexohexo: v3.3.8 1$ sudo npm install -g hexo 初始化博客新建一个空文件夹blog, 在blog文件夹下运行：1$ hexo init 本地站点预览1$ hexo server 浏览器里访问12345### 部署到github在github上创建个同账号名的repository，仓库名为：```your_user_name.github.io```.再修改blog/_config.yml配置文件，与github建立关联。 deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/your_user_name/your_user_name.github.io.git branch: master12345还需要安装部署插件包:``` bash$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 执行deploy命令就可以将生成的静态页面push到github中： 1$ hexo deploy 访问123456789## Hexo 常用命令Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).### Create a new post``` bash$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 修改后，重新部署123$ hexo clean$ hexo generate$ hexo deploy
